Title: Relates to enacting the taxpayer voter registration act
Summary: Allows taxpayers to register to vote upon paying their taxes or changing their address.
LawCode: Add §§664 & 45, Tax L; add §§997 & 997-a, RPT L; add §201-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, the real property tax law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to enacting the "taxpayer voter registration act"
